name: pentecost
description: This consist of the client and server codes, nothing to say for now..

scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd ./client && npm install &&  npm run build
scripts.init: cd ./server && npm i && cd .. && cd ./client && npm i && node ./node_modules/\@vue/cli-service/bin/vue-cli-service.js build && cd ..
scripts.start: cd server && export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./server/pentecost-voice.json && NODE_ENV=production node app.js
